name: POLLO PICANTE
description: Grilled chicken breast with parma ham taleggio cheese and spicy sausage in a rich tomato sauce.

name: POLLO KIEV
description: Garlic and herbs stuffed chicken in breadcrumbs served with garlic butter.

name: POLLO PANCETTA**
description: Breast of chicken cooked in white wine, English mustard, garlic, cream and leek sauce served with mashed potatoes, topped with crispy bacon.

name: POLLO PARMESAN**
description: Flattened chicken escalope deep fried in breadcrumbs then topped with bechamel sauce and melted cheddar cheese, served with salad, homemade chips and garlic dip.

name: POLLO DIANE OR AU POIVRE
description: Grilled chicken breast served with your choice of sauce.

name: POLLO CACCIATORE
description: Chicken breast cooked with peppers, onions, capers and mixed olives in a rich red wine and tomato sauce.

name: POLLO BOSCAIOLA
description: Chicken breast cooked with wild mushrooms and blue cheese sauce.

name: POLLO ASPARAGUS
description: Breast of chicken stuffed with cheese, asparagus and sun dried tomatoes, wrapped in streaky bacon and served in a cream, white wine and garlic sauce.

name: POLLO TOSCANO**
description: Grilled chicken breast with spinach and mozzarella served with white wine and cream garlic sauce on a bed of tagliatelle.

name: POLLO CARAVAGGIO**
description: Pan fried breast of chicken with tiger prawns, Norwegian prawns with garlic, tomato and brandy in a lobster sauce served with timbale of rice.

name: CHICKEN GRILL
description: Chicken breast grilled served with vegetables or house fries and a choice of spaciada sauce or blue cheese sauce.

name: POLLO PEPERONETA
description: A breast of chicken cooked in white wine, garlic, mixed peppers, garden peas and leeks. Served in a creamy tomato sauce.

name: HOT SHOT PARMESAN**
description: Flattened chicken escalope, deep fried in crispy breadcrumbs. Topped with a rich béchamel sauce, green jalapeños and spicy pepperoni. Then finished with a layer of melted cheddar cheese. Served with a house salad, chips and garlic dip
